animal.question: I meow and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Sometimes I wear a bell around my neck.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🛁 I love to play in water.

animal.question: I say 'Oink!' and like to roll in mud. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big and gray.
🌍 You can find me in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. What am I?
I have a mane and roar loudly. What am I?
I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.

animal.question: I climb trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?
I am round and go around the Sun. We live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have lots of water and land.

cosmos.question: I come out at night. Sometimes I am big and round, sometimes small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I shine because the sun lights me up.
🌚 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm a crescent.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light, very far away. There are many, many of me! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am a large celestial body composed of gas, orbiting a star but not a star itself. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am one of the eight that go around our sun.

cosmos.question: Sometimes you see me fall from the sky, a quick flash of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I burn up in the air.
✨ Some people call me a falling star.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 I could be a bear
lines ↔️ People draw imaginary lines to connect the stars.
sky 🌃 Look up to see me.

cosmos.question: I'm a big, cold, icy ball that sometimes has a tail when I get near the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of ice and dust.
🌬️ The sun's heat makes me change.

cosmos.question: I am a vast system of stars, gas, dust, and dark matter, held together by gravity. Our sun lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I'm a very big space place.
💫 I have many solar systems inside of me.

cosmos.question: I am a system consisting of a star and all the celestial bodies orbiting it, including planets, moons, asteroids, and comets. Earth is in one. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I have a star in the middle.
🌎 Earth is one of my planets.
🪐 I am where planets orbit a star.
